introduce_product:
The base model for this collection is the BLX-560, which feature a thin compact design, and a comfortable fit. Retro 90's surf fashion faded base colors are offset by bold face colors to create new looks for the G-LIDE lineup. The faces of both the G-SHOCK and the BABY-G models are decorated with the silhouette of a surfboard, identifying them as part of a paired set.
The designs and colors of these models add attractive accents to the wrist both on the beach and on the town.
list_specification_product: Flashes with buzzer that sounds for alarms, hourly time signal, countdown timer progress beeper, and stopwatch auto start
29 time zones (48 cities), daylight saving on/off
Tide graph (tide level for specific date and time)
Moon data (moon age of the specific date)
Measuring modes: Elapsed time, split time, 1st-2nd place times
Countdown start time setting range: 1 minute to 24 hours (1-minute increments and 1-hour increments)
Regular timekeeping: Hour, minute, second, pm, month, date, day
Approx. battery life: 3 years on CR1616
